gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Interface VistaPatientDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RpcVistaPatientDao

    public interface VistaPatientDao

    Data Access Object for VistA Patients.

    This is an interface to allow for easy mocking. See RpcVistaPatientDao for the "real" implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Patient getPatient(int dfn)
      Loads a Patient from VistA given his/her DFN.
      java.lang.String saveRiskCalculationNote(Patient patient, java.lang.String electronicSignature, java.lang.String noteBody)
      Saves the finished calculation to VistA, given the calculation, electronic signature, and the note body
